languages.text: {n}Уголок губ Калькасара ползет вверх. Приличествующе солидным тоном он отвечает:{/n} "Не смею и тревожить нашего повелителя молитвой о сей милости, в высшей степени непозволительной в столь сложное время".

{n}The corners of Calcazar's mouth creep upward. In a befittingly grave tone, he replies,{/n} "I would be loath to trouble our Master with a prayer for such an indulgence, especially one so utterly inappropriate at this fraught time."
languages.original_text: {n}Уголок губ Калькасара ползет вверх. Приличествующе солидным тоном он отвечает:{/n} "Не смею и тревожить нашего повелителя молитвой о сей милости, в высшей степени непозволительной в столь сложное время".

traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: {n}卡尔卡扎嘴角微微上扬，以恰如其分的严肃语气回答道。{/n}“我并不愿意用这样的小事来打扰我们的主人，尤其是在这种危机四伏的时候。”
languages.original_text: {n}The corners of Calcazar's mouth creep upward. In a befittingly grave tone, he replies,{/n} "I would be loath to trouble our Master with a prayer for such an indulgence, especially one so utterly inappropriate at this fraught time."

traits.locale_text: {n}卡尔卡扎嘴角微微上扬，以恰如其分的严肃语气回答道。{/n}“我并不愿意用这样的小事来打扰我们的主人，尤其是在这种危机四伏的时候。”
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: {n}Las comisuras de la boca de Calcazar se curvan hacia arriba. En tono severo, responde:{/n} «No me gustaría molestar a nuestro señor con una oración tan indulgente, especialmente en un momento tan poco apropiado como este».
languages.original_text: {n}The corners of Calcazar's mouth creep upward. In a befittingly grave tone, he replies,{/n} "I would be loath to trouble our Master with a prayer for such an indulgence, especially one so utterly inappropriate at this fraught time."

traits.locale_text: {n}Las comisuras de la boca de Calcazar se curvan hacia arriba. En tono severo, responde:{/n} «No me gustaría molestar a nuestro señor con una oración tan indulgente, especialmente en un momento tan poco apropiado como este».
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: {n}カルカサルの口角がゆっくり上がっていく。言葉に見合ったまじめな口調で彼は答える。{/n}「そのような免罪符を求める祈りでマスターに迷惑をかけるつもりはない。特にこんな緊迫した時期にはまったくもってふさわしくない」
languages.original_text: {n}The corners of Calcazar's mouth creep upward. In a befittingly grave tone, he replies,{/n} "I would be loath to trouble our Master with a prayer for such an indulgence, especially one so utterly inappropriate at this fraught time."

traits.locale_text: {n}カルカサルの口角がゆっくり上がっていく。言葉に見合ったまじめな口調で彼は答える。{/n}「そのような免罪符を求める祈りでマスターに迷惑をかけるつもりはない。特にこんな緊迫した時期にはまったくもってふさわしくない」
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: {n}Un léger sourire se dessine au coin des lèvres de Calcazar. Sur un ton grave de circonstance, il répond :{/n} « Jamais je n'oserais déranger notre Maître en lui adressant une prière aussi égoïste, qui serait d'autant plus malvenue au vu de la période tendue que nous vivons. »
languages.original_text: {n}The corners of Calcazar's mouth creep upward. In a befittingly grave tone, he replies,{/n} "I would be loath to trouble our Master with a prayer for such an indulgence, especially one so utterly inappropriate at this fraught time."

traits.locale_text: {n}Un léger sourire se dessine au coin des lèvres de Calcazar. Sur un ton grave de circonstance, il répond :{/n} « Jamais je n'oserais déranger notre Maître en lui adressant une prière aussi égoïste, qui serait d'autant plus malvenue au vu de la période tendue que nous vivons. »
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: {n}Calcazars Mundwinkel verziehen sich nach oben. In einem angemessen ernsten Ton antwortet er:{/n} "Ich würde unseren Herrn ungern mit einem Gebet um so einen Luxus ersuchen, vor allem nicht an einem völlig unangebrachten Zeitpunkt wie diesem."
languages.original_text: {n}The corners of Calcazar's mouth creep upward. In a befittingly grave tone, he replies,{/n} "I would be loath to trouble our Master with a prayer for such an indulgence, especially one so utterly inappropriate at this fraught time."

traits.locale_text: {n}Calcazars Mundwinkel verziehen sich nach oben. In einem angemessen ernsten Ton antwortet er:{/n} "Ich würde unseren Herrn ungern mit einem Gebet um so einen Luxus ersuchen, vor allem nicht an einem völlig unangebrachten Zeitpunkt wie diesem."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: {n}Calcazar'ın yüzüne bir tebessüm hâkim oluyor. Buna yakışır ciddilikte bir tonla yanıtını veriyor.{/n} "Üstadımızdan böylesi bir zevküsefa için dua isteyerek onu rahatsız etmeyi hiç uygun görmüyorum. Özellikle şu kara günde."
languages.original_text: {n}The corners of Calcazar's mouth creep upward. In a befittingly grave tone, he replies,{/n} "I would be loath to trouble our Master with a prayer for such an indulgence, especially one so utterly inappropriate at this fraught time."
